objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Romance lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about hobbies and free time using formal register
Students create original romance themed content about hobbies and free time in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Romance story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using formal register in romance context
Character B: Responding in formal register within romance theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with heart
hobbies and free time with passion
hobbies and free time with affection

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
